thread.title: Warmer weather brings crowds to Tokyo cherry blossoms spots earlier than usual

title: Warmer weather brings crowds to Tokyo cherry blossoms spots earlier than usual
text:
Warmer weather brings crowds to Tokyo cherry blossoms spots earlier than usual   00:59 
Tens of thousands of Japanese people and tourists visit Tokyo's Ueno Park to see the cherry blossom trees which bloom every year. Rough cut (no reporter narration)
